name: AsteroidAttack
description:
Welcome to ASTEROID ATTACK! Blast, race and dodge your way past incoming asteroids and enemy ships to the sound of a  SMOOTH SYNTH-WAVE SOUNDTRACK!

This is our first ever game so we would love to hear what people think. Tell what you love, tell us what you hate. Help track down some more bugs for us to squish, or just tell us how much our programming sucks! All feedback is greatly appreciated and helps us to improve the game and any future projects  :)

The current build is available to play in browser or as a download (recommended). This build is acting as a test for us to improve and refine the game ready for our ultimate goal of an Android release.

ENJOY!

CONTROLS:

-Forward Thrust: 'W'

-Aim: 'Mouse'

-Fire: 'RMB'
